title: Originally, I Was A Delinquent, But Now I’m A Serious Girl! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life   Shoujo Ai   Supernatural
author: シュレーディンガーの猫
description:
I was a former delinquent, but when I entered high school I got serious.

My grades aren’t good, but my behaviour is adequate. I have 0 friends because of my face and a rumour.

One day, I received a nutritional supplement drink from my younger sister, so I drank it at school.

Then, my body changed, my chest swelled up, and my butt became big. My waist became thinner, my shoulder width got narrower and my hair grew. Also my height shrank?

This looks like a girl… does it not?

How did this happen…

Is this seriously a story about a stupid girl?>
